backend/main.mo: Defines the canister actor for storing layouts and logging events with control names, providing APIs to save layouts and query events.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old layout and event data to new types by adding optional controlName fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles including theme variables, fullscreen workspace rules, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app that applies theming and renders the control panel screen with a toaster.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Ad: Modal UI for creating new controls with type-specific settings, validation, and default values.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Co: Context provider managing control layout state, backend sync, creation, updates, and persistence.
Renders different control types (button, toggle, slider, radio) and emits signals or updates state based on user interaction unless in edit mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Cr: Displays an Add Control button that opens a modal only when layout is initialized and in edit mode, with disabled-state tooltips.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Dr: Wraps a control with draggable positioning logic in edit mode and updates its coordinates during drag.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Fu: Provides a button to enter or exit fullscreen for a workspace element, showing errors via toast if unsupported or failed.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Im: Handles exporting controls layout to JSON and importing a layout file, showing validation errors and applying imported data.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/In: Displays editable properties for the selected control, including ID, type, label, and radio options, with validation and update logic.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Mo: Toggles between edit and runtime modes with a button that reflects the current mode.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Re: Shows a scrollable list of recently emitted signals with timestamps and allows manual refresh.
frontend/src/components/control-panel/Wo: Renders all controls in a positioned workspace, enabling selection and dragging in edit mode and showing a placeholder when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlLayout.ts: Provides a React context and hook for accessing and modifying control layout state, including CRUD operations and layout persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useFullscreen.ts: Implements a fullscreen management hook that tracks support, state, and provides enter, exit, and toggle functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanelMode.ts: Manages an edit/runtime mode state with persistence in localStorage and a toggle helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentSignals.ts: Fetches recent events from the backend actor using react-query with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignalEmitter.ts: Provides a mutation to emit control signals via the backend actor and refresh recent events on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, theme variables, fullscreen rules, control panel styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/binaryCode.ts: Validates binary strings and generates deterministic 8â€‘bit binary codes from a seed string.
frontend/src/lib/controlDefaults.ts: Provides default configuration values for each control type when creating new controls.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility to download JSON data as a file using a generated Blob and temporary link.
frontend/src/lib/layoutSerialization.ts: Validates, imports, and exports layout configurations, including control field checks and binary code validation.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with react-query and Internet Identity providers.
Renders the main control panel layout including header, workspace, side panels, and footer, adapting sidebars based on edit mode.
frontend/src/types/controlPanel.ts: Defines TypeScript types for control configurations, including buttons, toggles, sliders, and radio groups used in the control panel.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and state related to runtime button interactions and event logging.
